Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Requires compliance with the uniform land use review procedure for the disposition of school property in New York city
Summary: Requires compliance with the uniform land use review procedure for the disposition of school property in New York city.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring compliance with the uniform land use review procedure for the disposition of school property in New York city
